title: Scroll of punishment/ko
data:
| ? [![Scroll.png](/images/8/8d/Scroll.png)](/wiki/File:Scroll.png) |                                                               |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Name                                                              | punishment                                                    |
| Appearance                                                        | [random](/wiki/Randomised_appearance "Randomised appearance") |
| Base price                                                        | 300 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                             |
| Weight                                                            | 5                                                             |
| Ink to write                                                      | [5-9](/wiki/Magic_marker "Magic marker")                      |
| Monster use                                                       | *Will not be used by monsters.*                               |

The **scroll of punishment** is one of the nastiest scrolls in the game. It [punishes](/wiki/Punishment "Punishment") you by chaining a heavy [iron ball](/wiki/Iron_ball "Iron ball") to you, which hinders your movements.

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 읽었을때의 효과](#.EC.9D.BD.EC.97.88.EC.9D.84.EB.95.8C.EC.9D.98_.ED.9A.A8.EA.B3.BC)

- [2 생성](#.EC.83.9D.EC.84.B1)

- [3 감정](#.EA.B0.90.EC.A0.95)

- [4 메시지](#.EB.A9.94.EC.8B.9C.EC.A7.80)

- [5 전략](#.EC.A0.84.EB.9E.B5)

- [6 변종](#.EB.B3.80.EC.A2.85)

  - [6.1 언넷핵](#.EC.96.B8.EB.84.B7.ED.95.B5)
  - [6.2 슬래시엠 익스텐디드](#.EC.8A.AC.EB.9E.98.EC.8B.9C.EC.97.A0_.EC.9D.B5.EC.8A.A4.ED.85.90.EB.94.94.EB.93.9C)

## 읽었을때의 효과

| case     |         | 효과                |
| -------- | ------- | ----------------- |
| 축복 또는 혼란 |         | 효과 없음             |
| 미저주      | 미징벌 상태  | 당신이 징벌받음          |
|          | 징벌받은 상태 | 철구의 무게가 160 만큼 증가 |
| cursed   | 미징벌 상태  | 당신이 징벌받음          |
|          | 징벌받은 상태 | 철구의 무게가 320 만큼 증가 |

## 생성

징벌의 두루마리는 다른 모든 300zm 두루마리와 동일한 확률로 랜덤하게 생성됩니다. 무작위로 생성되는 모든 두루마리 중 1.5%가 징벌의 두루마리입니다.

마법사와 수도승은 감정된 징벌의 두루마리와 함께 시작할수 있습니다.

## 감정

It is expensive, so when unidentified, less careful players might mistake it for the [scroll of genocide](/wiki/Scroll_of_genocide "Scroll of genocide") or the [scroll of stinking cloud](/wiki/Scroll_of_stinking_cloud "Scroll of stinking cloud"). When blessed, this scroll is harmless; you only get the message "You feel guilty".

두루마리는 읽었을때 자동감정 됩니다.

## 메시지

| Message                                        | Reason                     |
| ---------------------------------------------- | -------------------------- |
| "You feel guilty."                             | 두루마리가 축복받았거나, 당신이 혼란 상태    |
| "You are being punished for your misbehavior!" | 두루마리가 미저주 상태거나 저주받은 상태     |
| "A ball and chain appears, then falls away."   | 징벌을 받았으나 쇠사슬이 붙어 있을수가 없었다. |

## 전략

징벌의 두루마리중 가장 좋은 것은 재판매 가치라고 합니다. 그것 말고도, 당신은 아마도 이것들을 [비우는](/wiki/Wet "Wet")데 사용하고 싶을 것입니다.

See [punishment](/wiki/Punishment "Punishment") for why being punished may be desirable. Short version: it isn't, except as a makeshift weapon before you see anything else, or some corner cases involving jumping.

## 변종

### 언넷핵

Reading a non-blessed scroll of punishment while confused will summon a [punisher](/wiki/Punisher "Punisher"). This reveals it as a Bad Idea.

### 슬래시엠 익스텐디드

Monsters can use scrolls of punishment, which will punish **you** (not the reading monster) with a heavy iron ball chained to you. Therefore, you probably shouldn't leave them on the floor where monsters can pick them up. This includes selling them in a shop.

[![This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.1. Click here for more information.](/images/d/d3/Nh361-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.1. Click here for more information.")

**This page may need to be updated for the [current version](/wiki/Current_version "Current version") of *NetHack*.**

It may contain text specific to [NetHack 3.6.1](/wiki/NetHack_3.6.1 "NetHack 3.6.1"). Information on this page may be out of date.

**Editors:** After reviewing this page and making necessary edits, please change the {{nethack-361}} tag to the current version's tag or {{noversion}} as appropriate.

Scroll of punishment/ko

From NetHackWiki
< Scroll of punishment
Jump to navigation Jump to search
?
Name punishment
Appearance random
Base price 300 zm
Weight 5
Ink to write 5-9
Monster use Will not be used by monsters.

The scroll of punishment is one of the nastiest scrolls in the game. It punishes you by chaining a heavy iron ball to you, which hinders your movements.

Contents

  • 1 읽었을때의 효과
  • 2 생성
  • 3 감정
  • 4 메시지
  • 5 전략
  • 6 변종
    • 6.1 언넷핵
    • 6.2 슬래시엠 익스텐디드

읽었을때의 효과

case 효과
축복 또는 혼란 효과 없음
미저주 미징벌 상태 당신이 징벌받음
징벌받은 상태 철구의 무게가 160 만큼 증가
cursed 미징벌 상태 당신이 징벌받음
징벌받은 상태 철구의 무게가 320 만큼 증가

생성

징벌의 두루마리는 다른 모든 300zm 두루마리와 동일한 확률로 랜덤하게 생성됩니다. 무작위로 생성되는 모든 두루마리 중 1.5%가 징벌의 두루마리입니다.

마법사와 수도승은 감정된 징벌의 두루마리와 함께 시작할수 있습니다.

감정

It is expensive, so when unidentified, less careful players might mistake it for the scroll of genocide or the scroll of stinking cloud. When blessed, this scroll is harmless; you only get the message "You feel guilty".

두루마리는 읽었을때 자동감정 됩니다.

메시지

Message Reason
"You feel guilty." 두루마리가 축복받았거나, 당신이 혼란 상태
"You are being punished for your misbehavior!" 두루마리가 미저주 상태거나 저주받은 상태
"A ball and chain appears, then falls away." 징벌을 받았으나 쇠사슬이 붙어 있을수가 없었다.

전략

징벌의 두루마리중 가장 좋은 것은 재판매 가치라고 합니다. 그것 말고도, 당신은 아마도 이것들을 비우는데 사용하고 싶을 것입니다.

See punishment for why being punished may be desirable. Short version: it isn't, except as a makeshift weapon before you see anything else, or some corner cases involving jumping.

변종

언넷핵

Reading a non-blessed scroll of punishment while confused will summon a punisher. This reveals it as a Bad Idea.

슬래시엠 익스텐디드

Monsters can use scrolls of punishment, which will punish you (not the reading monster) with a heavy iron ball chained to you. Therefore, you probably shouldn't leave them on the floor where monsters can pick them up. This includes selling them in a shop.

This page may need to be updated for the current version of NetHack.

It may contain text specific to NetHack 3.6.1. Information on this page may be out of date.

Editors: After reviewing this page and making necessary edits, please change the {{nethack-361}} tag to the current version's tag or {{noversion}} as appropriate.

The '''scroll of punishment''' is one of the nastiest scrolls in the game. It [[punishment|punishes]] you by chaining a heavy [[iron ball]] to you, which hinders your movements.

징벌의 두루마리는 다른 모든 300zm 두루마리와 동일한 확률로 랜덤하게 생성됩니다. 무작위로 생성되는 모든 두루마리 중 1.5%가 징벌의 두루마리입니다.

두루마리는 읽었을때 자동감정 됩니다.

See [[punishment]] for why being punished may be desirable. Short version: it isn't, except as a makeshift weapon before you see anything else, or some corner cases involving jumping.

==변종==
===언넷핵===
Reading a non-blessed scroll of punishment while confused will summon a [[punisher]]. This reveals it as a Bad Idea.

===슬래시엠 익스텐디드===
Monsters can use scrolls of punishment, which will punish '''you''' (not the reading monster) with a heavy iron ball chained to you. Therefore, you probably shouldn't leave them on the floor where monsters can pick them up. This includes selling them in a shop.
